title: [ASR] `a(1)(4:9)` not recognized as `StringSection` given `character(10) :: a(1)`
body:
`integration_tests/arrays_09.f90`

```fortran
program arrays_09
implicit none
character(10) :: a(1)
a(1) = 'Substring'
if(a(1)(4:9) /= 'string') error stop
end program
```

translates to the following ASR

```
(TranslationUnit (SymbolTable 1 {arrays_09: (Program (SymbolTable 2 {a: (Variable 2 a Local () () Default (Character 1 10 () [((IntegerConstant 1 (Integer 4 [])) (IntegerConstant 1 (Integer 4 [])))]) Source Public Required .false.)}) arrays_09 [] [(= (ArrayItem (Var 2 a) [(() (IntegerConstant 1 (Integer 4 [])) ())] (Character 1 10 () []) ()) (StringConstant "Substring" (Character 1 9 () [])) ()) (If (StringCompare (ArrayItem (Var 2 a) [(() (IntegerConstant 1 (Integer 4 [])) ())] (Character 1 10 () []) ()) NotEq (StringConstant "string" (Character 1 6 () [])) (Logical 4 []) ()) [(ErrorStop ())] [])])}) [])
```

in which `a(1)(4:9)` is not recognized as a `StringSection`.
